project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Project is to assist the Borrower in improving passenger and freight traffic flows in an efficient and safe manner along the corridor from Ankang to Maoba in Shaanxi Province by: (i) enhancing road infrastructure capacity and network integration along the corridor Ankang-Maoba; (ii) increasing accessibility to markets and social services for the lower-income families in rural areas of Ankang; and (iii) strengthening Shaanxi Provincial Communications Department's capacity in managing the increasing number of kilometers of roads under its responsibility in the Shaanxi province and, in particular, within the Ankang region. There are 3 components to the Project. Component A is the Ankang-Maoba Expressway (AME). This component includes the construction of an 87 km expressway connecting Ankang and Maoba and includes the construction of the relevant ancillary buildings and the acquisition of the relevant electrical and mechanical (E&M) facilities. It will also require the acquisition of land and the resettlement of people. The design of the AME has paid adequate consideration to road safety features and has minimized the social and environmental impacts, based on the analysis undertaken at the feasibility stage and further adjustments required upon completion of the preliminary engineering designs. A joint local-foreign consulting firm will supervise the construction of the AME, in a manner similar to the one implemented under the AME component o f the Second Shaanxi Provincial Highway Project. Component B is the Local Roads Improvement Program (LRIP). The LRIP aims at improving of interconnection between provincial, county and village roads in the rural areas surrounding the corridor Ankang - Maoba Expressway. The interventions will consist of rehabilitation of existing roadways, with adjustments to its width when necessary or upgrading existing non-mot

P075613.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>陕西安康公路发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>项目将协助陕西省交通厅改善安康至毛坝沿线地区的交通条件，实施发展安全高效交通的计划。项目预期将扩大安康至毛坝沿线地区的公路交通基础设施能力和路网整合，改善安康农村地区低收入居民进入市场和获得社会服务的交通条件，并加强陕西省交通厅对本省特别是安康地区日益增加的公路里程的管理能力，从而达到项目的目标。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
